article_title: Wyoming Legislature considers marijuana, firing squads for death penalty

article_metadata.news_keywords: , medicaid, wyoming legislature, cannabis laws, patient protection and affordable care act, john patton, wyoming state board of education, joint judiciary interim committee, wyoming department of parks and cultural resources, jim byrd, gerald gay, robert mckim, labor committee, workplace fatalities, penalities, decriminalize, next generation science standards, asset forfeiture, laura hancock

LAURA HANCOCK

og.description: The Wyoming Legislature will consider expanding Medicaid to low-income Wyomingites, allowing the execution of death row inmates by firing squad and dozens of other bills in 2015.
